answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Lou, 
Here are two documents on Hillsborough County's Asset Management Program. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/20291
http://icma.org/en/Article/10853/The_GetItDoneRight_Asset_Management_Program
I hope these documents help you in creating your own asset management program. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

answers.author: David Evertsen
answers.text:
I recommend you contact Barry Strock at 518.461.5009 or barry@strock.com for referrals to several local governments; and possibly Rob Savage at Rob Savage at rob.savage@pb.com. Mention my name.

author: Lou O'Boyle
text: We are interested in learning from localities that have implemented an asset management program for centrally assessing, tracking and valuing assets and their condition. We are particularly interested in infrastructure like buildings, parking lots, roads, etc.
title: Asset Management
